attributes.action: Investigate Brexit negotiations to determine if Remain has led the agenda
attributes.background: Looking at the outcome of the Brexit negotiations it could be suggested that they have been conducted with a view to leaving the EU in name alone and should be independently investigated to find out if there was a hidden (remain) agenda for the beginning.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action.

We are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You might want to sign this petition which calls for all Brexit-related official documents to be published if that is something you would like to see happen:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231932
